sourcesContent:
<template>
    <button @click="viewPdf" class="btn btn-primary">
      ðŸ“„ Ver libro (PDF)
    </button>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  export default {
    props: {
      pdfUrl: {
        type: String,
        required: true
      }
    },
    methods: {
      viewPdf() {
        this.$router.push({ 
          name: "PdfPreview", 
          query: { pdfUrl: this.pdfUrl } 
        });
      }
    }
  };
  </script>
  
  <style scoped>
  button {
    margin-top: 10px;
  }
  </style>
